entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR THIS EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 30S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
TEMPERATURE FALLING TO AROUND 40 IN THE AFTERNOON
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW AND RAIN SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY AND NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 40

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
